What kind of community engagement does Verus have?

Verus has a strong community engagement, with community members sharing their experiences and creations, such as mining rigs, on the Verus Discord channel. This shows that the community is active and enthusiastic about the project.

🔊 Public Technical Updates from Mike Toutonghi
On January 8, 2022, Mike Toutonghi gave the community technical updates on the Verus Discord channel. 🔊 You can listen to it here.
